data.prayer: the county of Shimla has (about) 8,954 people who know Jesus, 9,877 people who know about him culturally, and 795,169 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Shimla access to a Bible in their own language.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jat Dhillon (Muslim traditions) people.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Shimla.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Shimla to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Shimla, Himachal Pradesh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Shimla
location.people_groups_list: Arain (Hindu traditions), Rajput Baria (Sikh traditions), Jat Opal, Beriya (Muslim traditions), Jat Nol
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arain (Hindu traditions) (277,000), Rajput Baria (Sikh traditions) (2,700), Jat Opal (400), Beriya (Muslim traditions) (600), Jat Nol (100)
